heisig_chinese_memo: Once in a blue or green moon" refers to a rare event. But originally "blue moon" refers to a full moon, in other words a fully grown up moon. Whether once a month is rare or not depends on what we're talking about, but that happens to be the origin of the expression.
koohiiStory1: The last time I saw a blue moon was in my youth when I was growing up.
koohiiStory2: Once in a blue moon refers to a rare event. But originally "blue moon" refers to a full moon, in other words a fully grown-up moon. Whether once a month is rare or not depends on what weÂ´re talking about, but that happens to be the origin of the expression.

humanum_full_description_en:
" Blue " from " birth " from " dan ", the initial meaning of the configuration is unknown, and it is suspected to be the blue color when vegetation grows.

Oracle only saw it, from "å±®" to " dan ". The oracle bone inscriptions "Green House", that is, the house of the ancestral temple (Wang Xiang, Ma Rusen). Bronze inscriptions from " birth " from " dan ", pill or " well ", " birth " grows like grass and trees, and the original meaning of " green " refers to the green color (Lin Yiguang) where grass and trees grow. "Shi Ming": "Dian, birth. The appearance of the elephant is also the color." Ma Xulun believes that Dan is the name of a stone, and the original meaning of " blue " is the color of stone. It is more reasonable as before. The color of vegetation growth is evergreen, but the red stone may not be blue. " Sheng " and " Well " as sound symbols, belong to the farming department with the ancient rhyme of " Qing ". " Dan " and " well " are similar in shape and are commonly used as parts. The " blue " of the " quiet " in the bronze inscription is mostly made from the " well ". In the late inscriptions, " green " is added with " mouth " as decoration pen.

Clementine is mostly used as a name. Scholars also read it as " Jing ", and the wall plate: "Qing (Jing) is quiet and high and (ancestor), at the place of micro-spirit." It means that the high ancestor lived quietly and secluded in the micro land (Tang Lan). It is also used in the original meaning to mean cyan. Fanjun Baipan: "Use its cyan." "Xunzi. Encouraging Learning Chapter": "Taking it from the blue, but from the blue."

The Chu Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period are read as " love ". Nature is born out of it: "Qing (qing) was born in Yu (sex)."

"Said Wen": "Green, oriental color. Wood makes fire, from the pill. Danqing's beliefs and words are like the same. All the green belongs to the green. ğ¡·‰, ancient Wenqing."
